column1: The Purple Pig////We ordered the bone marrow
column2: which was delicious. Comes with toasted bread and an acidic herb salad. There's also salt to season yourself. The combination is amazing. We also had the octopus
column3: which was super tender. The best part of the meal was probably the milk marinated short rib. It's creamy on the inside
column4: and it completely falls apart when you stab into it with your fork.
